Description:
Detects the use of Windows Credential Editor (WCE)

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - Windows Credential Editor (WCE) Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((hashes like '%imphash=a53a02b997935fd8eedcb5f7abab9b9f%' or hashes like '%imphash=e96a73c7bf33a464c510ede582318bf2%') or (command like '%.exe -s' and parent_process_path like '%\services.exe')) and  not process_path like '%\clussvc.exe')
